description: THE ULTIMATE JEWEL MATCHING QUEST! Travel the globe, raid ruins, and solve perilous puzzles. Mobilize for Match-3 adventure on Palm® PreTM!  TAKE ON OVER 100 CHALLENGES Utilize the touchscreen power of your Palm Pre to tackle 70 jewel boards and 30 puzzles. Test your reaction skills with 12 Speed Boards!  MATCH YOUR STYLE OF PLAY Enjoy Quick Play, Adventure, Puzzle, and Speed modes. Look out for special jewels that can help or hinder your progress as you play through exotic and mysterious locations around the world.   FOLLOW CRYPTIC CLUES IN YOUR QUEST  Draw on new Power Ups while you piece together the mystery revolving around your quest for the fabled Golden Jewel Board. Enter the Trophy Room to track your achievements at each step.   CHECK OUT OUR OTHER GREAT GAMES:  MONOPOLY, TETRIS®, The Sims™ 3, Sudoku, and Need for Speed™ Undercover
